descriptionlist.description:
Colorize your badges! ColorBadges will modify badges based on the app icon colors. To increase contrast, ColorBadges will also add an outline around the badge.

ColorBadges will colorize folder badges based on the highest numbered badge inside the folder (or the first badge if none of them are numbered).

ColorBadges works great with most themes and is compatible with Badge Customizer - you can use it to change the position and alpha level of the badges if you so please.

ColorBadges supports iOS 7+ devices, including your iPhones, iPads, iPod touches, and arm64 devices.

Developers, you can use ColorBadges' coloring algorithm in your tweaks. See the API documentation here.
